Release notes for Xaraya core release 1.0.2

  release 1.0.2 (only relevant changes from 1.0.1 onwards included here)

  Possible incompatible changes:
	* Installing: see the file INSTALL.txt
    * Upgrading : see the file UPGRADE.txt
	
  General improvements:
    * style improvements in Xaraya Classic related to new FF releases
    * template comment settings for mail generated by templates works correctly 
      and independent of template comments for html output
    * mail: cc and bcc support for the test-config action
    * removal of a adodb file which caused a security risk
    * small html error in index.php for the low level error catch
    * bind variables improvements in the blocks modules
    * additional security checks in displaying role information
